# Release Checklist for image-drift-generator

- [ ] Update `README.md` with latest usage and setup instructions
- [ ] Verify all dependencies are listed in `requirements.txt`
- [ ] Ensure `.gitignore` excludes all generated and sensitive files
- [ ] Check that `output/` and its subfolders are empty or contain only example files
- [ ] Validate that `run.sh` and `config.sh` are executable and documented
- [ ] Review code in `src/` for comments and clarity
- [ ] Add or update license file (e.g., `LICENSE`)
- [ ] Tag the release in git
- [ ] Test the full workflow from input to output
- [ ] Update this checklist as needed
